body_text:
@mythmon
Distribution ID based recipe(s) not showing

Tried "showHeartbeat" and "Log to Console"
Tried fresh profile
Tried overriding with about:config's distribution.id

Recipes:

ShowHeartbeat: https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net/control/recipe/117/
Console: https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net/control/recipe/118/

Ping rrayborn for Funnelcake used.  It's windows only.
This is an important component of a Growth experience going out next week.

title: Distribution Based Recipe not Showing
body:
@mythmon 

Distribution ID based recipe(s) not showing

- Tried "showHeartbeat" and "Log to Console"
- Tried fresh profile
- Tried overriding with about:config's distribution.id

Recipes:

- ShowHeartbeat: https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net/control/recipe/117/
- Console: https://normandy-admin.prod.mozaws.net/control/recipe/118/

Ping rrayborn for Funnelcake used.  It's windows only.

This is an important component of a Growth experience going out next week.
